tool_description: Website Categorization API lets you define the website category of a given URL.
name: Website Categorization
title: Website Categorization

api_list.name: Webiste Categorization (v1)

optional_parameters.name: hardRefresh
optional_parameters.description: 0 is used for getting the cached category if there is one. 1 is used for demanding the website categorization from scratch. Default: 0

optional_parameters.name: outputFormat
optional_parameters.description: Response output format. Acceptable values: XML or JSON. Defaults to JSON.
